      • updateRepositoryState

        void updateRepositoryState(String reportedVersion)
                    throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        This method computes the state of the repository that's associated with the desired version. It is used, for example, when a host component reports its version and the state can be in flux.
        Parameters:
        reportedVersion -
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • getRepositoryState

        RepositoryVersionState getRepositoryState()
        Returns:
        the repository state for the desired version
